title: The Missing Piece
description: Join 27 wonderful female writers as they share with you their inspiring and uplifting stories of struggle,perseverance and determination from the survival of 27 uniquely courageous personal battles.Compiled by Kate Gardener of 'Hot Mama (In High Heels)''The Missing Piece: A transformational journey' not only raises awareness regarding the very real struggles that many women will face, (abuse, vocation, bullying, depression,identity...)But acknowledges the strength, the hope and the joy of being a survivor.You too can overcome your personal battles. You are not alone!Join us. Become a thriver.
author: Kate Gardner
